name: Nana is Off the Map - Beta 1.0
name_original: Nana is Off the Map - Beta 1.0
description:
Nana is Off the Map

Nana's letter prompted a visit.

Someone on this island knows something.

This is a BETA of my first game. Made using RPG maker MV.

Assets are derived from public domain or CC 3.0. All others made by me or friends.

Game is unfinished.  Feedback of any kind is welcome.
